price: 11. Diggah nanu lee caddok taturteeh kulliimik amo ciggilte waqdi, doynikit Nabii Nuucú luk sin nukkuqeeh sin raaqisne.
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
